title: arrayInsertAt
name: arrayInsertAt
description:
Inserts a value at the specified position in the array.
If the element is inserted before the end of the array, Lucee shifts the positions of all elements with a higher index to make room.

arguments.name: array
arguments.description: The array which will have the new element inserted.

arguments.name: position
arguments.description:
The numerical index in the array where the new element will be inserted.
Must be less than or equal to the length of the array.
Remember CFML arrays start at 1 not 0.
